article.name: What is Mackerel's IP address and port number?
article.title: What is Mackerel's IP address and port number?
article.body:
• Both mackerel.io and kcps-mackerel.io are hosted from the range below. In the event of a change, an announcement will be made in advance.
    • 13.113.31.156/32
    • 54.92.89.142/32
    • 52.196.35.56/32
    • 52.69.239.167/32
    • 52.198.226.45/32
    • 52.198.218.152/32
    • 13.113.245.173/32
    • 52.199.207.168/32
    • 52.193.231.228/32
  • The port number is 433.

  • mackerel-agent also makes requests with the above-mentioned IP address and port number.

  • See the following page for source IP addresses for Mackerel notifications and external monitoring requests.

    • What is the source IP address for Webhook and other servicesâ€™ alert notifications from Mackerel?
